ygData.subject: Stacking Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: From the discussions that we ve been having here on this list in the last three days or so, it occurred to me that what we need is some sort of cross reference
ygData.messageBody:
From the discussions that we've been having here on this list in the last
three days or so, it occurred to me that what we need is some sort of cross
reference of what songs stack with what. I'm only level 20 so it would be
difficult for me to produce a lot of the information myself, but I would
volunteer to assemble the data into a graphical reference or HTML table. This
is the sort of thing that I would print out and keep laying around when I
played, how about you guys 'n' gals?

Crier - 20th song Bard on Fennin Ro

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/
